name: Jamba Jumble
description:
A push-your-luck puzzler about making the best smoothies!

Controls

Arrow keys: Move around the grid

Z: Start folding a die

X: Cancel a fold (costs 1 score)

Scoring

After finishing a die, the blender will roll it into a fruit. You'll score points equal to the the number of faces that matched that fruit on the original die.

Each round, one fruit is worth double!

Rolling a bomb loses the game, but collecting 6 bombs at once disarms all of them!

Game by Jacob Asimow

Art by Eli Asimow

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022
